main event: Sergeant John Doe, USAF, observed a bright circular object hovering over Macon, Georgia for about 15 minutes before it accelerated rapidly and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 50 feet in diameter and emitted a reddish-orange glow., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., A separate incident involved a witness reporting an oval-shaped object emitting bright light hovering for about 5 minutes before it disappeared., Multiple airmen observed a group of unidentified circular objects emitting bright light that maneuvered inconsistently with conventional aircraft., The investigation classified the sighting as unresolved with no conclusive explanations.
sighted object: a bright circular object emitting a reddish-orange glow
